title: The.Bureau.XCOM.Declassified.Hanger.6.R.And.D.DLC-RELOADED
description:
The Bureau: XCOM Declassified - Hanger 6 R&D DLC (c) 2K Games
        11/2013 :..... RELEASE.DATE .. PROTECTION .......: Steam+CEG
              1 :.......... DISC(S) .. GAME.TYPE ........: Strategy
       
  Note :
  This release also includes Code Breakers DLC & Light Plasma Pistol DLC.
  ------
  

  In the days leading up to the events of The Bureau: XCOM Declassified, Agent
  Nico DaSilva volunteers for a series of dangerous secret experiments to
  identify and treat a terrifying new pathogen. Maximize your combat skills and
  push your team to its limits to protect a friend from his own hallucinated
  terrors.
  
  
  1. Unrar
  2. Burn or mount the image.
  3. Install the DLC to where you installed the game.
  3. Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack directory to your game
     install directory.
  4. Play the game.
  5. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT!
